Uses of Class
com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint.JointBase

  • Packages that use JointBase 
    Package Description
    com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint  

    • Uses of JointBase in com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint

      Subclasses of JointBase in com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JointDistance
      A distance joint, makes length between bodies constant.
      class  JointFriction
      Friction Joint, is used for top-down friction.
      class  JointGear
      Gear Joint, is used to connect two joints together.
      class  JointMotor
      Motor Joint, used to control the relative motion between two bodies.
      class  JointMouse
      Mouse joint, used in the testbed to manipulate bodies with the mouse.
      class  JointPrismatic
      Prismatic joint, allows for relative translation of two bodies along a specified axis.
      class  JointPulley
      Pulley joint, used to create an idealized pulley.
      class  JointRevolute
      Revolute Joint, forces two bodies to share a common anchor point, often called a hinge point.
      class  JointRope
      Rope joint, enforces a maximum distance between two points on two bodies.
      class  JointWeld
      Weld joint, essentially glues two bodies together.
      class  JointWheel
      Wheel joint, provides two degrees of freedom: translation along an axis fixed in bodyA and rotation in the plane.
